page.title: 17Hatfield Broad Oak Life: 2
page.content: { Life in the village - continued. { School ends at 3.15 pm but on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday there are voluntary after school activities until 4.15 pm. After that on Tuesday I go to the local library, which is just up the road from my house. Also on Tuesday evening I go to bell-ringing, which is great fun! On Thursday at 5.30 pm I have a piano lesson. (My teacher is the son of a famous orchestral conductor who died a few years ago.) On Saturday I go shopping with my mother. We go to Bishop's Stortford, which is our local market town. At about 5.00 pm we have our tea, which is, of course, again bran, "which is good for you"!
